Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LaCT1 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (70.21%) toscorpion	Heterin-1A: 19%, K: 17%; N: 11%.Activity: active against E. coli NBRC 3972 (MIC 0.25-0.5 uM), S. aureus NBRC 13276  (MIC 10-25 uM), and B. subtilis NBRC 3009 (MIC 0.5-1.0 uM).Insecticidal activity:  injected into an abdominal region of crickets Acheta domesticus (LD50 89 nmol/g).Structure: predicted to be helical.
Literature Information.Author: Miyashita M, Sakai S, Okabe R, Kawai S, Kishimoto T, Kitanaka A, Mitani N, Nakagawa Y. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Identification and synthesis of a long-chain antimicrobial peptide from the venom of the Liocheles australasiae scorpion.
